summary: world no 1 williams beat sara errani in the fed cup play-off on sunday . the us were beaten 6-0 6-3 in the doubles rubber by errani and flavia pennetta . serena williams won her 19th singles grand slam at the australian open .

aspect: 1. American tennis star Serena Williams fought back to beat Italian Sara Errani in the Fed Cup play-off on Sunday.
